Real_World_Examples: Arctic coastal plains, high alpine tundra regions
Vibes: Treeless cold plains of dwarf shrubs, mosses, and thaw ponds; reindeer, permafrost, and sudden storms.

Short_Description: High elevation terrain lacking vegetation, either glacier, bare rock, or snow/ice
Real_World_Examples: Greenland ice margins, large alpine glaciers
Vibes: Bare ice and snow with crevasses; almost no forage, brutal weather, and constant environmental hazard.

Real_World_Examples: Siberia, interior Canada and Alaska
Vibes: Endless conifers, long snowy winters, boggy hollows and biting insects.

Short_Description: Extremely dry sand or stone deserts with sparse or no life
Real_World_Examples: Central Sahara, Atacama core, Rub’ al Khali, cold stony basins
Vibes: Extremely dry sand or stone deserts with very sparse life; heat or cold, thirst, and navigation are the main threats.

Short_Description: Deserts with rare seasonal rain, vegetation
Real_World_Examples: American Southwest, Sahel fringe, Iranian plateau edges
Vibes: Rocky or scrubby deserts with some hardy vegetation and seasonal rains; canyons, mesas, and thorny scrub.

Short_Description: Four season broadleaf and mixed forest
Real_World_Examples: Eastern US woods, central European forests
Vibes: Classic four-season forest of oaks and beeches; archetypal fantasy woods.

Short_Description: Temperate coniferous forest, including montane forests and temperate rainforests
Real_World_Examples: Pacific Northwest coasts, interior mountain conifer belts
Vibes: Thick conifer woods from wet coasts to mountain slopes; mist, deep shade, and rugged terrain.

Real_World_Examples: Indian monsoon deciduous forests, parts of Central America
Vibes: Dense broadleaf forest that drops leaves in the long dry season; dusty, then explosively lush in the rains.

Real_World_Examples: Amazon, Congo Basin, Borneo lowlands
Vibes: Steaming multi-layer jungle; very slow travel, huge biodiversity.

Short_Description: Typically highland warm conifer forests, with open understories
Real_World_Examples: Mexican pine–oak forests, Central American highland conifers
Vibes: Warm highland forests of pines and oaks; clear understory, good trails, foggy ridges.

Real_World_Examples: North American prairies, Argentinian pampas
Vibes: Deep, fertile grasses under big skies; fast travel and high farming potential.

Real_World_Examples: Serengeti plains, Brazilian cerrado, Indian savanna
Vibes: Warm open grassland with scattered trees, strong wet–dry seasons, herds, predators, and frequent fires.

Real_World_Examples: Central Asian steppe, drier Great Plains
Vibes: Sparser, shorter grass, big temperature swings; nomads, dust storms, and long horizons.

Short_Description: Moors, high elevation meadows, other open hilly or mountainous terrain
Real_World_Examples: Scottish Highlands, alpine meadows in Alps/Rockies, Tibetan pastures
Vibes: Cool, windy uplands of rough grass and shrubs; from sheepy moors to high alpine summer pastures.

Real_World_Examples: Northern France farmlands, North China Plain
Vibes: Intensively farmed fields, orchards, irrigation, villages everywhere.

Real_World_Examples: Medieval European countryside, New England mixed farms
Vibes: Patchwork of fields, hedgerows, and woodlots with scattered villages.

Real_World_Examples: Central Asian grazing lands, drier parts of Great Plains
Vibes: Semi-wild grazing country with herders, fences, and long stock trails.

Real_World_Examples: Peat bogs of Ireland/Scotland, Canadian muskeg
Vibes: Spongy, peaty ground with dwarf trees, hidden pools, and mist; a classic haunted wetland.

Real_World_Examples: Sundarbans, Florida mangroves, SE Asian coasts
Vibes: Brackish tidal forests with tangled roots, shifting channels, and crocodiles; smugglers and monsters love it.

Short_Description: Flooded forests; wetlands dominated by trees
Real_World_Examples: Okefenokee, Congo and Amazon swamp forests, temperate floodplain woods
Vibes: Forests standing in slow dark water; tangled roots, humidity, insects, and hidden channels.

Real_World_Examples: Klamath Marshes, Okavango grasslands, large river and lake marshes
Vibes: Wide reedbeds and shallow water; boats and causeways instead of roads, rich in birds and amphibians.

Short_Description: Dry summer, wet winter forests and scrub
Real_World_Examples: Mediterranean Basin hills, California chaparral, Chilean matorral
Vibes: Hot dry summers, wet winters; oaks, scrub, frequent fires; bandit hills above wine valleys.
